data.expected_result: The app shouldn't crash and a photo should be taken only if the button is pressed when the camera is fully loaded
data.short_description: App crashes when pressing the shutter before the camera fully loads on some devices
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you have the permission to upload files - Click on the plus button and tap on the camera, then quickly press that shutter button before the camera fully loads (while you still see a grey screen) - Notice that the app crashes
